an5.74:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
an5.74:1.3: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu dhammavihari hoti”ti?
an5.74:2.2: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam;
an5.74:2.4: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu pariyattibahulo, no dhammavihari’.
an5.74:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam vittharena paresam deseti, uttari cassa pannaya attham nappajanati.
an5.74:3.2: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu pannattibahulo, no dhammavihari’.
an5.74:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam vittharena sajjhayam karoti, uttari cassa pannaya attham nappajanati.
an5.74:4.2: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu sajjhayabahulo, no dhammavihari’.
an5.74:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam cetasa anuvitakketi anuvicareti manasanupekkhati, uttari cassa pannaya attham nappajanati.
an5.74:5.2: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu vitakkabahulo, no dhammavihari’.
an5.74:6.2: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam;
an5.74:6.4: Evam kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu dhammavihari hoti.
an5.74:7.1: Iti kho, bhikkhu, desito maya pariyattibahulo, desito pannattibahulo, desito sajjhayabahulo, desito vitakkabahulo, desito dhammavihari.
an5.74:7.2: Yam kho, bhikkhu, satthara karaniyam savakanam hitesina anukampakena anukampam upadaya, katam vo tam maya.
an5.74:7.3: Etani, bhikkhu, rukkhamulani, etani sunnagarani. Jhayatha bhikkhu, ma pamadattha, ma paccha vippatisarino ahuvattha. Ayam vo amhakam anusasani”ti.
